name: Blaster
desc: Every fourth Basic Attack from a Blaster fires additional attacks at random enemies. These additional attacks deal damage like Basic Attacks, trigger on-hit effects and can critically hit.

name: Chrono
desc: All allies gain 15% Attack Speed every some seconds.

name: Cybernetic
desc: Cybernetic champions with at least one item gain Health and Attack Damage.

name: Dark Star
desc: When a Dark Star Champion dies, all other allied Dark Star Champions gain Attack Damage and Spell Power

name: Demolitionist
stats: Damage from Demolitionists' spellcasts stun their for 1.50 seconds. (Once per spellcast)

name: Infiltrator
desc: Innate: At the start of combat, Infiltrators move to the enemy's backline. Infiltrators gain Attack Speed for 6 seconds at the start of combat, refreshes on takedown

name: Mana-Reaver
stats: Mana-Reaver attacks increase the mana cost of their target’s next spell by 40%

name: Mech-Pilot
desc: The Super-Mech has the combined Pilots Health, Attack Damage, and Traits of its Pilots, as well as 3 random items from among them. When the Super-Mech dies the Pilots are ejected, continue to fight.
stats: At the start of combat, three Mech-Pilot champs are merged into a Super Mech.

name: Protector
desc: Protectors shield themselves for 4 seconds whenever they cast a spell. This shield doesn't stack.

name: Rebel
desc: At the start of combat, Rebels gain a shield and increased damage for each adjacent Rebel. The shield lasts for 8 seconds.

name: Blademaster
desc: Blademasters' Basic Attacks have a chance to trigger two additional attacks against their target. These additional attacks deal damage like Basic Attacks and trigger on-hit effects.

name: Celestial
desc: All allies heal for some of the damage they deal with spells and attacks.

name: Sorcerer
desc: All allies have increased Spell Power.

name: Void
stats: Attacks and spells from Void champions deal true damage.
abstract: bond:Attacks and spells deal true damage:(//)

name: Sniper
stats: Snipers deal 15% increased damage for each hex between themselves and their target.

name: Space Pirate
desc: Whenever a Space Pirate lands a killing blow on a Champion there is a chance to drop extra loot.
stats: 50% for 1 gold and 25% for a component item
abstract: bond:extra loot:(50% for 1 gold/50% for 1 gold and 25% for a component item)

name: Star Guardian
desc: Star Guardians' spellcasts grant Mana to other Star Guardians spread among them.

name: Valkyrie
stats: Valkyrie attacks and spells always critically hit targets below 40% health.
